Posts.Content: Hi all, Within a month of checking a lump which turned out to be a cyst, they found cancer in other. So far surgery has taken place, WLE and SLNB on 27 jan. Radiotherapy to follow. And also the results of SLNB. So I still have the plasters on. Should get results next week. But I would like to know is how deep is this wound under my armpit! Its ?????? sore! Does anyone know how deep it could be? By the way a great informative site! ThankyouÂ
Posts.Title: New here.
